entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kananaskis (Nakiska Ridgetop)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.4°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -15.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
